sentence: Pennsylvania Republican gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano wrote a thesis in 2001 saying a left-wing putsch? against the U.S. military would destabilize the country.
author: Lexi Lonas
title: Pa. GOP governor hopeful Mastriano wrote thesis warning of left-wing Hitlerian Putsch

sentence: Two decades before he was Republican nominee for Pennsylvania governor, Doug Mastriano warned in a masters thesis that the United States was vulnerable to a left-wing Hitlerian Putsch? that would begin with the dismantling of the U.S. military and end with the destruction of the countrys democracy.
author: Greg Jaffe
title: Doug Mastriano warned of left-wing Hitlerian Putsch in 2001 paper

sentence: Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano wrote a master's thesis two decades ago warning of a left-wing Hitlerian Putsch."
author: Travis Gettys
title: Trump-loving Doug Mastriano aired 'poisonous' conspiracies in old thesis calling for military takeover of US society
